name: phixah_mainweb
description: - `app.js`: Main entry point. Sets up Express, middleware, and routes. - `routes/`: Route definitions. - `controllers/`: Route handler logic. - `models/`: Data models or database schemas. - `middlewares/`: Custom middleware functions. - `config/`: Configuration files. - `public/`: Static assets (CSS, JS, images). - `views/`: Template files for rendering HTML.
author: Phixah
